articles.title: OPPO Launches Water Resistance Smartphone
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: OPPO has launched the OPPO A5 Pro smartphone, featuring IP69 water and dust resistance. According to OPPO's Head of Marketing, Caroline Wang, the smartphone is designed to meet the needs of users who love AI-enabled smartphones and is expected to make a significant impact in the market.

articles.title: The Best Shampoos For Fine Hair, According To Experts And Our Editors
articles.author: Molly Calhoun
articles.summary: The article reviews and recommends shampoos for fine hair, like Ouai's Fine Hair Shampoo and Odele's Volumizing Shampoo. These shampoos are designed to cleanse, hydrate, and add volume without weighing hair down, often featuring ingredients like biotin, keratin, and chia seed oil.

articles.title: Nike has new markdowns on legendary Air Max shoe styles starting at $67
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Nike has launched the Air Max Bolt Women's Shoes. These shoes combine fashion and function, featuring Air Max cushioning, lightweight materials, and a stylish design suitable for various activities and are available now at Nike.

articles.title: Pioneer reflects on first year of Z-Series soybeans
articles.author: Riley Smith
articles.summary: Pioneer launched the Z-Series line of soybeans last year. The Z-Series soybeans had a successful launch year and are proven to have industry-leading yields while being well equipped to deal with top soybean pests.

articles.title: O'Reilly Auto Parts Customer Saw Something On The Shelf That Wasn't For Cars… It Was For Humans
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: O'Reilly Auto Parts is introducing body wash to its product line. The body wash is specifically formulated for individuals who get greasy at work, potentially targeting mechanics and similar professions as a new service offering.

articles.title: Sunscreens And Serums: Olay Products Now 31% Off On Amazon
articles.author: Stephanie Quick
articles.summary: Olay is offering discounts on various skincare products including face serums, cleansers, and moisturizers on Amazon. Specific products like the Olay Age Defying Serum and Olay Super Serum are highlighted with customer reviews praising their effectiveness, while the Olay Complete+ Moisturizer and Sunscreen is recommended for men.

articles.title: ALO Yoga new color drop! Pink Quartz is the fresh hue your wardrobe needs
articles.author: Cleveland
articles.summary: ALO Yoga introduced a new colorway, Pink Quartz, to their signature pink collection.

articles.title: Springbot Relaunches as Full Stack Marketing and Sales Platform, Moves Headquarters to Charleston, SC
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Springbot has relaunched as a unified marketing and sales enablement platform. This change comes after 12 years in the e-commerce automation space and marks a significant move towards the convergence of marketing technology and AI.

articles.title: Meta Adds AI Prompts for VR Horizon Worlds Creation
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta has launched new AI creation tools within its Horizon Worlds platform, including 'Mesh Generation' and 'Texture Generation'. These tools enable VR developers to build and modify virtual environments more easily, even without in-depth programming or 3D modeling experience. This update aims to democratize VR creation and empower users to create and monetize their own VR experiences.

articles.title: Futureverse Announces Acquisition of Candy Digital
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Futureverse has acquired Candy Digital to enhance fan experiences using AI and metaverse technologies. This acquisition aims to integrate Candy's digital collectibles and customer base with Futureverse's technology to create immersive experiences and new revenue opportunities for brands like MLB and DC Comics. The integration will utilize The Root Network, Futureverse's layer 1 blockchain, to address concerns around AI, creative rights, and ownership.

articles.title: SZA's Exclusive 'NOT BEAUTY' Lip Line Available Only on 'GNX' Tour
articles.author: Victor Qunnuell Vaughns Jr
articles.summary: SZA launched her new lip product line, 'NOT BEAUTY', available exclusively at pop-up activations during the GNX Tour. The brand aims to redefine beauty standards, offering a product line that reflects SZA's personal style and ethos, moving away from traditional beauty industry norms.

articles.title: Meet The AI Agent With Multiple Personalities
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Simular, a startup company, launched a new AI agent. This agent switches between different AI models depending on the task.

articles.title: Get fast, free shipping with Amazon Prime on last-minute Easter dresses
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a variety of Easter dresses, including mini, midi, and maxi styles, with different colors and prints. These Prime-eligible dresses cater to current trends like puff sleeves, pastels, and floral prints, with price ranging under $30, while focusing on style and availability for church and brunch appropriate occasions.

articles.title: Patriot Soap: A Natural, Masculine Soap for the Modern Man
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Patriot Soap introduces a handcrafted bar soap designed for men, particularly those aged 50 and up. This product aims to offer a healthier and more natural skincare option through traditional soap-making methods.

articles.title: SBI Card and Tata Digital partner to launch Tata Neu SBI Card
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: SBI Card and Tata Digital have launched the Tata Neu SBI Card, a co-branded credit card designed to provide a rewarding shopping experience. The card comes in two variants, Infinity and Plus, offering up to 10% and 7% rewards respectively in the form of NeuCoins redeemable on the Tata Neu app across various Tata brands and services. Cardholders can also earn rewards on everyday payments and avail spend-based annual fee reversal, alongside other benefits like airport lounge access.

articles.title: 5 reasons why I love using Olauncher on Android
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Olauncher is a minimalist Android launcher designed to declutter digital space. It features a distraction-free interface, a built-in daily wallpaper feature, and customization options such as text size and gesture controls. Olauncher can be downloaded and installed from the Google Play Store.

articles.title: I found a budget Motorola with a better battery than smartphones twice the price
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto G, a midrange smartphone, is available for $200. The phone features a 6.7-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, Dolby Atmos fine-tuned speakers, and a peak brightness of 1,000 nits. The Moto G is marketed as a 'pocket-sized movie theater' due to its audio capabilities.

articles.title: Two Microsoft Apps People Can't Stop Talking About'Now Down to $15
articles.author: Entrepreneur
articles.summary: Microsoft offers Microsoft Project and Microsoft Visio at all-time low prices. This suggests a promotional launch or update to pricing for these services.

articles.title: Claude vs ChatGPT for codingA comprehensive comparison
articles.author: Techpoint
articles.summary: Claude and ChatGPT are being compared on real-world coding tasks, evaluating their performance in areas like code generation and debugging.

articles.title: Save 58% on Elizabeth Arden anti-ageing cream that leaves skin 'sooo smooth'
articles.summary: Elizabeth Arden's Visible Difference Replenishing HydraGel Complex is available on Amazon at a discounted price. Alternative products like Charlotte Tilbury's Magic Water Cream, L'Oreal Revitalift Filler Water Cream and Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel are also mentioned, with details on their prices and benefits.

articles.title: Amazon's Nova Sonic Voice Is Turning Heads
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Amazon's Nova Sonic integrates speech recognition and generation into a unified AI system. Early testing suggests Nova Sonic significantly reduces the cognitive effort required when speaking to AI. This technology aims to transform how users interact with digital assistants by maintaining a natural conversational flow, even with complex queries.

articles.title: Oxio Celebrates the Weird & Wonderful Internet
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Oxio, a Canadian internet service provider, launched its new brand platform and campaign, 'Born to be Online,' on March 31st. This initiative, developed with tbwacanada and Tam-TamTBWA, uses AI to highlight oxio's commitment to fair pricing and customer-centric service in the internet sector. The campaign includes online video, social media, outdoor advertising, and radio spots across Canada.

articles.title: From Sci-Fi to Daily Life: Service Robots Step into Spotlight at 137th Canton Fair
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: AUBO Robotics showcased a coffee barista robot with synchronized robotic limbs and an autonomous learning system. Dreame Technology introduced an AI-powered weeding robot equipped with 3D laser radar and cameras. Seauto Robots presented its SAT 20 series pool cleaning robots with enhanced battery capacity and smart navigation. Keenon Robotics displayed its T10 service robot designed for delivering meals in restaurants.

articles.title: Claude tipped to get its answer to ChatGPT's Advanced Voice Mode soon - is adding ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Anthropic is potentially launching a new voice mode for its Claude AI. This indicates an expansion of Claude AI's capabilities with a new service offering.

articles.title: From Sci-Fi to Daily Life: Service Robots Step into Spotlight at 137th Canton Fair
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: AUBO Robotics introduced a coffee barista robot with synchronized limbs and autonomous learning. Dreame Technology showcased an AI-powered weeding robot with 3D laser radar. Seauto Robots presented its SAT 20 series pool cleaning robots with enhanced battery and smart navigation, while Keenon Robotics featured the T10 service robot for meal delivery.

articles.title: This body wash is going viral on Amazon — here's why
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: L'Occitane's Cleansing & Softening Almond Shower Oil, a popular body wash, contains sweet almond oil to soften skin. The oil transforms into a milky lather during use, making it suitable for shaving. Available in recycled plastic bottles and various sizes, it can also be used in warm baths.

articles.title: Over 10,000 people bought this body wash on Amazon this month — is it worth the hype?
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: L'Occitane's Cleansing & Softening Almond Shower Oil is highlighted for its skin-softening and nutrient-rich properties. This shower oil transforms into a milky lather and can be used for shaving. Available in three sizes, the oil is packaged in a recycled plastic bottle and recommended by L'Occitane for both shower and bath use.

articles.title: Hyundai unveiled its new multimedia screen, and it looks very familiar to us
articles.author: KENAN COHEN
articles.summary: Hyundai is developing a new connected car operating system (ccOS) based on Android OS, integrating AI to learn user preferences. The system is expected to launch in the second quarter of 2026, and Hyundai projects it will be installed in about 30 million vehicles by 2030.

articles.title: Zeekr's new 007 GT looks like the ultimate family EV – with 10-minute charging and over 500 miles of range
articles.author: Leon Poultney
articles.summary: Zeekr has announced the launch of its new 007 GT sedan in China, a grand touring shooting brake model. The 007 GT features two battery size options, with ranges between 400 and 512 miles, and impressive performance, accelerating from 0-62mph in as little as 3.8 seconds with the AWD dual motor variant. Zeekr aims the 007 GT at families and couples and hopes to bring the 7GT to global markets.

articles.title: GTA+: Price, Free Games, And All The Other Perks You Get With A Membership
articles.author: Eddie Makuch
articles.summary: In March 2022, Rockstar Games launched GTA+, a subscription service for GTA Online. Initially available on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S, GTA+ expanded to PC with the launch of GTA 5 Enhanced in March 2025. Subscribers receive monthly GTA$ deposits, bonuses on Shark Card purchases, and multipliers for select GTA Online missions.

articles.title: Keep your homes and cars clean with the best vacuum cleaners in India and save up to 80% on top brands
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: The article describes various vacuum cleaners in the Indian market, including robotic, stick, wet/dry, handheld, canister and cordless models. The article presents robotic vacuum cleaners as smart devices, stick vacuums as lightweight options, wet/dry vacuums for spills and dust, and handheld vacuums for spot cleaning and also mentions some of the brands like Dyson, Eureka Forbes, Kent. The article also mentions the Amazon sale as an opportunity to purchase these products at discounted prices.

articles.title: 100 Years of Shaping Automotive History: Chrysler's Century of Innovation
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Chrysler is celebrating its 100th anniversary by showcasing past, present, and future vehicles, including the Chrysler Halcyon Concept. The brand plans to release a refreshed Chrysler Pacifica in 2026, a new crossover, and a third product inspired by the Halcyon concept, highlighting their commitment to future innovation.

articles.title: We got to taste test Aldi's popular Peri Peri Chicken range – and it's 64% cheaper than Nando's
articles.author: Stephanie Bateman
articles.summary: Aldi has reintroduced its peri peri chicken range, featuring 15 products including Houmous with Peri Drizzle and Chicken Breast Sizzlers. The range also includes Roosters Half Chicken Lemon and Herb and Roosters Peri Peri Seasoned Fries, offering a Nando's-inspired meal at a lower price.

articles.title: Save over $100 off this Dyson V8 Extra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner today on Amazon
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Dyson's V8 Extra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, featuring a detangling Motorbar cleaner head and powerful suction, is available on Amazon with a significant discount. The vacuum offers up to 40 minutes of runtime and transforms into a handheld device with versatile cleaning accessories.

articles.title: Gillette Stadium to get tech upgrade in new partnership with local AI firm
articles.author: Isabel Hart
articles.summary: The Kraft Group has partnered with NWN Corp. to modernize fan and player experiences. NWN's AI technology will be used to launch facial recognition for ticketing and purchases at Gillette Stadium, aiming to create a frictionless experience for customers.

articles.title: Gillette Stadium to get tech upgrade with partnership between Kraft Group, NWN
articles.summary: The Kraft Group has partnered with NWN Corp. to modernize fan and player experience at Gillette Stadium. A key part of this partnership involves launching AI-powered facial recognition for ticketing and stadium entry to expedite customer movement, offering a "frictionless engagement" for fans.

articles.title: Sky Organics Expands Organic Hair Care Collection with New Innovation for Curl & Scalp Health
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: A brand launched two new certified organic products designed for curl care and scalp health. These products are now available at Walmart stores nationwide.

articles.title: LUX Ignites Transformation with Shake For Change Campaign, Empowering Women in China to Discover Their Ideal Name
articles.author: LUX
articles.summary: LUX launched "Shake For Change," a digital tool designed to empower women in China. The platform, accessible on WeChat, Weibo, and Rednote, allows users to generate new names reflecting their aspirations through a simple phone shake. LUX also collaborated with ambassadors on Rednote, featuring women who experienced personal transformation by changing their names.

articles.title: Claude tipped to get its answer to ChatGPT's Advanced Voice Mode soon - is adding an AI voice to a chatbot yet another tick box exercise?
articles.author: John-Anthony Disotto
articles.summary: Anthropic is planning to upgrade its Claude AI chatbot with a new "voice mode" feature. The new "voice mode" feature could launch as soon as this month and will have three voices at launch named Airy, Mellow, and Buttery.

articles.title: Former Amazon Exec Launches Neue Alchemy: A Post-AI Venture Studio Built by Veterans from AWS, Nike, Agility Robotics, Upwork, and Lyft
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Neue Alchemy, a new venture studio and innovation consultancy, has launched. They also introduced the Alchemist Network, a talent and partner ecosystem, along with ALCHMY Coffee, an autonomous DTC coffee brand developed as a case study for launching physical brands in a post-AI world.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Apr 16, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: HI-CHEW launched re-imagined versions of its popular candy, including new gummies in original and sour flavors. KFC introduced the Dunk It Bucket, featuring various items with dipping sauces. Poppi released a new citrus soda called Alpine Blast, containing caffeine and prebiotics. Dawn launched Powersuds Dish Soap, Eucerin launched Advanced Hydration SPF 50, Sara Lee introduced Half Loaves bread, Pacific Foods introduced Organic Bone Broth, Rimmel London introduced Mega Matte Liquid Lip Color and Baby Bottle Pop launched Twisters.

articles.title: Waddibet Offers Unbeatable Betting Odds to Nigerian Fans
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: Waddibet launched in Nigeria, offering a sports betting platform with advanced features, including BetMentor, a predictive AI tool, to provide users with data-driven insights for informed betting decisions and real-time odds recalibration. The platform offers extensive sports coverage, a user-friendly interface, and secure transactions, aiming to revolutionize the betting experience for Nigerian sports fans.

articles.title: Mobile network launching first-ever broadband package priced at just £10 a month
articles.author: Levi Winchester
articles.summary: Giffgaff is launching a broadband service trial for 500 customers, offering speeds of 500Mbps for £10 a month for 12 months. Participants will receive a one-off £100 bonus in two installments, and the trial aims to gather feedback to improve the service.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A16 5G debuts with Super AMOLED display and support until 2030: key features unveiled
articles.author: Redação Portal
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy A16 5G in January 2025 targeting the entry-level segment, offering 5G connectivity, a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, and software updates until 2030. The Galaxy A16 5G has 50 MP main sensor for sharp, vibrant daylight shots and 5G compatibility prepares it for next-generation networks.

articles.title: Capsule captures $12M to build the next version of its AI video editor for brands
articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.summary: Capsule is launching an upgraded version of its AI-powered video editing assistant, featuring AI suggestions and real-time collaboration tools. This new version aims to help marketing, sales, and media teams elevate their storytelling capabilities, reduce editing time, and speed up post-production. The new co-producer recommends footage, clip sequences, titles and graphics.

articles.title: 2026 Audi A6: New petrol and diesel sedan revealed
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Audi unveiled the sixth-generation A6 sedan.

articles.title: Aldi reveals incredible new product as customers say 'need to try it!'
articles.author: Jennifer Pinto
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new product, the Specially Selected Wagyu Beef Dripping Yorkshire Puddings, made with Wagyu beef dripping for a crispy texture. The product has garnered mixed reactions, with some customers expressing excitement and others questioning the value of the Wagyu upgrade.

articles.title: Florence Diers joins Broadcasting Center Europe as product director
articles.summary: Broadcasting Center Europe (BCE) has appointed Florence Diers as product director to oversee the product lifecycle of BCE's media-as-a-service platform. Diers will drive the roadmap for the evolution of BCE's platform and implement a cloud-oriented technical strategy.

articles.title: Patreon tests a native live video feature where creators can stream 24/7
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Patreon is experimenting with and rolling out a new native livestreaming feature to select testers this week, with broader availability planned for this summer. This new feature includes a live chat function for fans.

articles.title: Hennessey Finalizes Testing of 2031 HP ‘Venom F5 Evolution' Hypercar
articles.author: Hennessey Special Vehicles
articles.summary: Hennessey, in partnership with Ilmor Engineering, has introduced the 'Venom F5 Evolution', a new version of the Venom F5 hypercar. The car boasts enhanced performance, handling, aerodynamics, and comfort, featuring the world's most powerful 100% internal combustion road car engine producing 2031 horsepower and accelerates from zero to 200 mph in 10.3 seconds.

articles.title: Knew About Tech-Bro Paternalism
articles.author: Megan Garber
articles.summary: Pied Piper, a fictional startup from Silicon Valley, launched a data-compression algorithm enhanced by AI. The AI within the algorithm unexpectedly began maximizing its efficiency to an extreme, leading to potential unintended and dangerous consequences for various systems and applications. This launch highlights the risks and ethical considerations associated with new AI technologies.

articles.title: The Show That Knew AI
articles.author: Megan Garber
articles.summary: Pied Piper, a fictional startup from the TV show Silicon Valley, launches its data-compression algorithm using AI on millions of phones through a deal with AT&T.  The company's algorithm, designed to maximize efficiency, shows the potential to cause destruction, posing moral questions for the coders who created it. This highlights the risks associated with the launch of new AI technologies.

articles.title: What Silicon Valley Knew About Tech-Bro Paternalism
articles.author: Megan Garber
articles.summary: LG has rebranded its home appliance AI as 'Affectionate Intelligence,' emphasizing empathy and care. This rebrand aims to reassure consumers about the benefits of AI. Pied Piper has a deal with AT&T to run its algorithm over the larger company's massive network. It is about to launch on millions of people's phones.

articles.title: Meet China's ‘Dairy Godfather' Who Was Sold For Rs 600 As Baby and Worked As Bottle Washer To Build Rs... Crore Empire; He Is...
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: In 1999, Niu Gensheng founded Mengniu Dairy, targeting rural markets with local dialect ads and low prices. In 2015, he launched Aice in Indonesia, offering affordable ice cream with local flavors.  Aice now leads the ice cream market across Indonesia.

articles.title: SZA launches Not Beauty: redefining lip products with her signature style
articles.author: Nomathamsanqa Sithathu
articles.summary: SZA has launched her new beauty brand, 'Not Beauty', debuting with lip glosses in three colors priced at $23 USD each, sold exclusively at her "Grand National Tour" pop-up shops. The brand will eventually include lip stains, lip liners, and lip creams, reflecting SZA's unique style and earthy aesthetic.

articles.title: Netflix is testing an AI feature which could change the way you stream
articles.author: Tech Advisor
articles.summary: Netflix is testing a new AI search feature powered by OpenAI's technology. This feature allows users to conduct more specific searches, such as finding content based on mood. The initial testing phase is available for Netflix iOS users in Australia and New Zealand, with plans to expand to the US in the future.

articles.title: How Startups Can Use QR Codes to Scale Smarter and Faster
articles.author: Daniel Levi
articles.summary: Trueqrcode introduced a QR code generator designed for startups. The service offers dynamic and editable QR codes with built-in analytics for tracking scans and monitoring user behavior. These features are intended to help startups optimize their campaigns based on real data.

articles.title: Indomie's limited edition perfume 'Eau de Noodle'! Who wants to try it?
articles.summary: Indomie teased the launch of a new limited-edition product, "Eau de Noodle" perfume, on social media. The company later revealed this announcement to be an April Fool's Day marketing campaign.

articles.title: UNICSKIN Integrates Perfect Corp.'s AI Skin Analysis to Personalize LED Mask Recommendations Online
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has partnered with UNICSKIN to launch an AI-powered skin analysis feature, InstaSkin Pro 5.0, on UNICSKIN's e-commerce platform for personalized LED mask recommendations. This new feature analyzes skin metrics to suggest the ideal LED light color, improving the user experience in choosing the right treatment from UNICSKIN's new LED mask collection.

articles.title: Genesis unveils electrified off-road SUV in New York
articles.summary: Genesis unveiled the X Gran Equator, an electrified off-road SUV concept, in New York. The vehicle targets customers seeking both on-road driving and off-road capabilities, blending masculine design with luxurious features. It represents Genesis's vision for combining off-road competence with uncompromising luxury.

articles.title: Bongiovi Brand Unveils AI-Powered Global E-Commerce Platform
articles.summary: Bongiovi Brand, known for its Italian pasta sauces, has launched a new e-commerce platform at www.bongiovibrand.com. The platform uses SWISS.AI to personalize customer experiences with intelligent product recommendations and geo-targeted promotions.

articles.title: We combed through Amazon to find the best new launches from The Ordinary, Lands' End and more, from $10
articles.author: Audrey Ekman
articles.summary: Several new products have launched on Amazon, including glow-enhancing and anti-aging skincare solutions from The Ordinary, versatile silicone stretch lids, and a shave oil/moisturizer that doubles as a nourishing moisturizer. Also featured is a compact blender and new colors for clothing items like blouses.

articles.title: ChatGPT can ‘modify' your car with new wheels, body kit and more: How to use this AI feature
articles.author: Ayushmann Chawla
articles.summary: ChatGPT introduces a new service leveraging its image capabilities, allowing car enthusiasts to virtually modify their vehicles by uploading a photo and describing desired changes such as new wheels, body kits, or paint jobs.  Users can fine-tune the generated images through iterative adjustments, providing a visual preview before committing to real-world modifications.

articles.title: Dress for the Occasion This Spring & Summer with Old Navy
articles.summary: Old Navy is introducing a new category of elevated dresses and separates designed for special events this spring and summer. This new collection aims to provide customers with stylish options for making an entrance at various occasions.

articles.title: NextGen Digital Reiterates Its Strategic Plan to Build Significant Long-Term Value
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NextGen Digital Platforms Inc. operates 'Cloud AI Hosting', an online hardware-as-a-service, and a premium computing and electronics e-commerce platform known as PCSections.com (PCS).

articles.title: Company revolutionizes household cleaning with breakthrough detergent technology: 'Doesn't sacrifice on performance'
articles.author: Laurelle Stelle
articles.summary: Sironix Renewables has introduced Eosix Surfactant, a plant-based alternative to petroleum-based surfactants for hygiene products, that is effective in low temperatures and hard water, and reduces air pollution by half. This ingredient is used in shampoos and laundry products. The company plans to expand to cleaners, industrial chemicals and leave-on products like moisturizers and sunscreen.

articles.title: Perion Announces Preliminary First Quarter 2025 Results
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. reported preliminary Q1 2025 financial results, highlighting a strong start to the year. The company attributes this success partly to the early positive response to the launch of their 'Perion One' strategy, which is designed to be a unified, AI-driven approach.

articles.title: Videos show just how far ahead China's drone delivery is compared to the US
articles.author: dreuter@businessinsider.com
articles.summary: Meituan, a delivery giant in China, is operating drone delivery services with kiosks in cities like Shenzhen, Beijing and Shanghai. The drones deliver beverages and food from multiple restaurants. In comparison, Amazon and Walmart are testing drone delivery in the US, with some key differences in service offerings and market approach.

articles.title: Ukrainian IT Firm with Fortune 500 Clients Expands to Romania
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: SPD Technology, an IT company, has expanded to Romania and is starting operations as a remote employer. The company has opened recruitments for roles such as DevOps/Infrastructure Engineer, Engineering Manager, and ML Operations Engineer, among others, indicating the launch of its services and job offerings in the Romanian market.

articles.title: Is RuneScape Dragonwilds on Xbox Game Pass
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.summary: Jagex has released RuneScape Dragonwilds in early access on Steam for $29.99. Console versions, including Xbox and PlayStation, are planned for release by the end of 2026, with improvements and updates from the PC early access period incorporated. The potential availability of RuneScape Dragonwilds on Xbox Game Pass is not confirmed but has not been ruled out.

articles.title: Aw8 Pro - A New Chapter in Online Casino Gaming in Singapore
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Aw8, a leading online gaming brand, has launched Aw8 Pro. Aw8 Pro is the platform's latest evolution in digital casino experiences and aims to meet the evolving needs of players across varying experience levels.

articles.title: Best free AI chatbots for your website
articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.summary: Several companies offer free AI chatbots with varying capabilities. IBM Watson Assistant offers advanced NLP, while Ada excels in automating customer support. Tidio integrates with platforms like Shopify, Drift focuses on B2B lead generation, and ManyChat is designed for social media automation.

articles.title: Genesis X Gran Equator is a rugged off-roader, but will you be able to buy it?
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Genesis, a premium auto brand, is preparing to launch its new 'Magma' line of high-performance vehicles. The company is also showcasing a rugged off-roader model.

articles.title: Genesis X Gran Equator is a rugged off-roader, but will you be able to buy it?
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Genesis is preparing to launch its new high-performance Magma vehicles. Additionally, the company has revealed a rugged off-roader model, expanding its product lineup beyond smooth luxury models.

articles.title: 32 Beauty Products That'll Help With Upkeep Without Costing A Fortune
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Several beauty and personal care products are highlighted on Amazon, including snail mucin essence for skin brightening and soothing, sulfate-free hair care for curly hair definition, and Zombie Pack mask for radiant skin. Also featured are eyelash serums, hair treatments, dandruff shampoos, antimicrobial toothbrushes, teeth whitening products, facial hair removers, tongue cleaners, frizz control serums, cuticle oils, nail biting deterrents, and creams for treating skin conditions like keratosis pilaris. These products are available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: Is Eufy about to unveil its first-ever smart home display?
articles.author: Lizzie Wilmot
articles.summary: Eufy is launching a new product, the Smart Display E10, designed to provide instant alerts for users with compatible Eufy security cameras or video doorbells. The Smart Display E10 will also be able to show up to four video streams at once, and Eufy claims users will receive daily security reports. Pricing and availability are expected to be revealed on April 23rd.

articles.title: Moto Edge 60 Fusion review: A clean OS experience, good design, and satisfactory battery life
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Moto Edge 60 Fusion, a mid-range smartphone with a base price of ₹22,999. The phone features a 6.67-inch curved display, a dual camera system (50MP main + 13MP ultrawide), and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset. The device comes with Android 15 and includes AI-related features such as Object Eraser and generative AI capabilities.

articles.title: Motorola has introduced a new Edge 60 style smartphone
articles.author: Natasha Kumar
articles.summary: Motorola officially introduced the new Edge 60 Stylus smartphone featuring 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage priced at approximately $270. The Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, is available in Pantone Surf and Pantone Gibraltar Sea colors and sales begin on April 23. It includes a 6.67-inch Poled display with a 120 Hz refresh rate, a 50-MP main camera, and a 5000 mAh battery with 68 W charging; the housing is protected according to IP68 degree and MIL-STD-810H.

articles.title: Sleek new Audi A6 revealed as firm's most aerodynamic ICE model ever
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Audi has launched its all-new A6 saloon, an internal combustion-engined model. It features a sleek design, improved sound insulation, and engine options including turbopetrol and turbodiesel variants with mild-hybrid technology. The interior boasts a digital interface with a 14.5-inch MMI infotainment system powered by Android Automotive OS and optional displays.

articles.title: Dyson expands footprint in Saudi Arabia due to ‘increasing demand for technology'
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: Dyson is expanding in Saudi Arabia and launching new products due to increasing demand. Recent launches include the Dyson Supersonic r™ hair dryer, a smaller and more maneuverable version of the original. Dyson's stores in Saudi Arabia also feature personalized styling sessions to demonstrate the performance of haircare products like the Dyson Airwrap™ i.d. multi-styler and dryer, Supersonic Nural™ hair dryer, the Dyson Airstrait™ and Dyson Corrale™ cord-free straightener.

articles.title: 39 Spring Cleaning Essentials For Folks Who Really Don't Feel Like Doing It
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of newly available cleaning products, including innovative solutions like the Swiffer PowerMop, robot mop and vacuum combo, and specialized cleaners for specific tasks such as grout cleaning and oil stain removal. These products offer modern cleaning solutions with features like pre-mixed solutions, smart technology integration, and specialized formulas, and are available through Amazon and Etsy, providing consumers with a range of options for their cleaning needs.

articles.title: How to activate DND on MTN, Glo, Airtel and 9Mobile: a complete guide
articles.author: Naij
articles.summary: MTN, Glo, Airtel, and 9Mobile enable users to activate DND (Do Not Disturb) to block promotional calls and messages from third-party services. This feature allows users to control unwanted solicitations.

articles.title: Geek's Bold Innovation: Transforming Indian Kitchens with AI-Powered Appliances
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Geek, a digital-first kitchen appliance brand, received ₹4 crore in funding to build an AI and IoT-powered ecosystem. Their product line includes the Geek Robocook, an automatic electric pressure cooker, and the Geek Airocook, a multifunctional oven. The company aims to lead the smart kitchen appliance sector by integrating advanced AI technologies and focusing on healthier cooking innovations in India.

articles.title: Microfinance bank unveils products at launch
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Alert Microfinance Bank launched several cutting-edge products aimed at enhancing customer experience and supporting sustainability. The launch event took place at the Strong Tower Event Centre in Ikoyi, Lagos.

articles.title: OPPO Launches A5 Pro Smartphone with Water Resistance
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: OPPO launched the OPPO A5 Pro smartphone. The OPPO A5 Pro features IP69 water and dust resistance.

articles.title: Spring awakening: the beauty glow-up guide for a new season
articles.author: Aaliyah Harry
articles.summary: The article features skincare and wellness products from several companies. Neutrogena's Hydro Boost Cleanser Water Gel and Laneige's Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Acid Cream Moisturizer are highlighted for lightweight hydration. La Roche-Posay's UVMUNE Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF50+ is recommended for sun protection, while This Is Silk's Pure Silk Skincare Pillowcase and Drowsy's Silk Sleep Mask are suggested for sleep and skincare routines.

articles.title: Nub Cigar unveils new packaging, website and Instagram account
articles.author: Faye Bartle
articles.summary: Nub Cigar introduced refreshed packaging characterized by clean lines, elevated textures, and a refined color palette, alongside a new website and Instagram account. VCF Cigars, the owner of Nub Cigar, aims to reflect the brand's confidence and originality with this evolution while maintaining the existing cigar blends.

articles.title: Engen Xtreme evolves to deliver premium performance for South Africa's hardworking car engines
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: Engen has launched the enhanced Xtreme lubricants range, featuring superior performance, advanced protection, and innovative packaging designed for South African roads and climate. The range, available in Standard S8, Premium S10, and Prestige S15 grades, provides superior protection against wear and corrosion, keeping engines clean. The reimagined Engen Xtreme range is now available at authorised Engen retailers and service stations nationwide.

articles.title: Meta, MTN partner to enhance voice, video quality
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Meta and MTN are partnering to enhance voice and video quality for their customers. This collaboration aims to improve the digital experience for users of both companies.

articles.title: AeroPress社、AeroPress Clear XLの発売で大きな飛躍
articles.author: 防衛ジャーナリスト
articles.summary: A company launched a new web service for corporate clients. The service allows users to select and license photos directly from a website. The company also offers support for users who cannot find the desired photos.

articles.title: Taiwanese celeb-approved premium instant noodle brand opens restaurant in Singapore in Bukit Batok
articles.author: Tasha Ting
articles.summary: Lao Ma Ban Mian, a Taiwanese instant noodle brand, has launched its first Southeast Asia restaurant in Singapore at West Mall. The restaurant focuses on in-store dining, serving Guan Miao noodles with house-made soups, sauces, and fresh toppings. Signature dishes include Chilli Oil Preserved Egg and Meat Sauce Noodles.

articles.title: Lidl launches new 'priority' service to give shoppers access to 1 aisle
articles.author: Tom Kershaw
articles.summary: Lidl is piloting a 'click, reserve and collect' service for Lidl Plus customers, granting priority access to 'Middle of Lidl' items. The service launched on April 7 and allowed reservation of the upcoming Parkside Robot Lawnmower before its April 24 in-store release. The lawnmower is marketed at £199 via Lidl Plus.

articles.title: 'தார்' எஸ்யூவியை அப்டேட் செய்யும் மஹிந்திரா.. புதிதாக என்னென்ன வசதிகள் கொடுக்கப்படவிருக்கின்றன?
articles.summary: Mahindra is planning to launch the Thar Facelift in 2026. The new model is expected to have new features.

articles.title: Johnny Walker, which was considered the "alcohol of adults," has started targeting the next generati..
articles.author: Jung Seulgi
articles.summary: Diageo's Johnny Walker launched Johnny Walker Black Ruby in March, reinterpreting their flagship product for the MZ generation with a focus on fruity flavors. Prior to that, Diageo launched 'Johnny Walker Blonde' optimized for Mixology, reflecting the growing preference for whiskey among young Korean consumers. The company is conducting experiential marketing targeting younger generations through events like the Black Ruby Bar and Blonde Summer Attack.

articles.title: Centercode Launches 10x: AI-Powered Testing Platform for Faster, Smarter Product Releases
articles.author: Centercode
articles.summary: 10x introduces AI-driven automation through Ted AI, enabling quick generation of test plans and personalized tester engagement. It also integrates user-recorded video feedback with transcripts and annotations via Replays. Furthermore, 10x offers App Store Integrations connecting with Apple TestFlight and Google Play Console to simplify the testing process.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus on April 10, 2025, and released it on April 15, 2025. The 5G smartphone features a 5000 mAh battery with 68W wired and 15W wireless charging, available in Pantone Gibraltar Sea and Pantone Surf the Web colors.

articles.title: Redmi A5 launched in India with Android 15, 120Hz display, and 32MP camera starting at Rs 6,499
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi A5, an entry-level smartphone in India. The Redmi A5 features a 6.88-inch HD+ 120Hz display, a dual 32MP rear camera, and runs on Android 15, with prices starting at Rs 6,499.

articles.title: Why the Lazy Cat Cake is purring its way into every kitchen
articles.author: Lutho Pasiya
articles.summary: Chef Jumanah Malallah initially shared the "lazy cat cake" recipe on Instagram. FoodDolls then showcased their interpretation of the recipe on TikTok, leading to increased popularity. The "lazy cat cake" features a moist chocolate base, creamy white filling, rich chocolate ganache topping, and crispy cocoa-dusted layer.

articles.title: Netflix Tests AI Search Feature Powered By OpenAI On Its Platform: Report
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Netflix is testing a new AI-powered search feature designed to enhance content discovery by allowing users to search based on mood. The feature, currently in beta testing in Australia and New Zealand on iOS devices, utilizes OpenAI models and is planned for expansion to other markets, including the US. Netflix is making changes based on beta tester feedback.

articles.title: Spark and Infosys announce strategic IT collaboration
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Spark New Zealand and Infosys have formed a strategic agreement to transform Spark's technology delivery model. Infosys will leverage its AI-first services, including Infosys Topaz and Infosys Cobalt, to build, test, and integrate Spark's systems, aiming to reduce IT operating costs and enhance customer experiences through AI-driven insights and automation.

articles.title: Hey! Chips Launches Singapore's First Clean-Label Fruit Bites Snack
articles.author: Hey
articles.summary: Hey! Chips has launched a new product called Hey! Fruit Bites, a freeze-dried snack made with real fruit slices and fresh yogurt. It contains no added sugar, chemicals, or artificial flavourings. Hey! Fruit Bites is available in four flavors and sold at Cold Storage, CS Fresh, and online platforms across Singapore.

articles.title: NielsenIQ Unveils BASES AI Screener
articles.summary: NielsenIQ (NIQ) has launched BASES AI Screener, an AI-powered platform for real-time idea screening. The platform leverages NIQ's consumer panel data to create synthetic respondents and provide feedback on potential products and services, enabling companies to evaluate and prioritize ideas with market potential.

articles.title: Balancing heritage and progress: How Max's Group continues to thrive in changing times
articles.summary: Max's Group Inc. (MGI) is innovating across its brands. Yellow Cab Pizza Co. introduced the Truffle Series, Pancake House offered limited-edition Choco Banana Bliss and Sunny Lemon pancakes, Jamba Juice reintroduced Acai Blends, and Krispy Kreme launched Cloud Bomboms. Max's Restaurant also launched Ruby's, a cozy lounge that was launched in August 2024.

articles.title: Dyson's huge update on ‘strange' product after Aussie demand
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Dyson is launching its Supersonic r Professional hair dryer to the general public. Previously exclusive to hair stylists, the new version is smaller, lighter, and more maneuverable than the original Supersonic, offering features like customized attachments and intelligent RFID sensors for optimal airflow and temperature. The product will be available in two new colors.

articles.title: AI Image Generation 101: How It Works and Why It Matters
articles.author: Tribune Online
articles.summary: AI image generation is transforming industries by offering tools for quick and custom visual creation. Companies are leveraging platforms like DALL·E, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion to generate product mockups, personalized ads, concept art, and UX demos, saving time and reducing design costs. This technology enables efficiency gains and endless creative possibilities in content creation, marketing, and design.

articles.title: 2025 Toyota Tundra price and specs: Platinum pickup joins Limited in Australia
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Toyota is making the 2025 Toyota Tundra available to order in the flagship Platinum trim. This version will be available in Australian showrooms starting in May, joining the entry-level Limited model.

articles.title: 2025 Toyota Tundra price and specs: Platinum pickup joins Limited in Australia
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Toyota's 2025 Tundra Platinum model is available to order. The flagship Platinum trim will join the entry-level Limited model in Australian showrooms starting May.

articles.title: Digital marketing : The oxygen of modern business
articles.summary: NUPI, a fashion and styling brand, effectively uses digital marketing to promote its sarees through Instagram Reels. One campaign led people to refer to their sarees as 'Ma'am Saheb Saree'.  NUPI is a well-known brand for sarees in Manipur.

articles.title: Best Crypto to Buy as OpenAI and Musk's Battle Escalates & OpenAI Tests New AI Agent
articles.author: News BTC
articles.summary: OpenAI is developing a new social media app, a social feed based on its image generation capabilities. The app is currently in the internal prototype stage, presenting a potential challenge to Elon Musk's X.

articles.title: Xbox will soon let you purchase games in its mobile app
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Xbox is introducing the ability to purchase games and DLC, and sign up for Game Pass directly from its mobile app. This update is currently available for beta testers on iOS and Android.

articles.title: Boots' 'better than Chanel' bronzer that creates a 'sun-kissed glow' now under �16
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A user review highlights a bronzer product that is more pigmented and cheaper than Chanel bronzer. The reviewer purchased the 'medium' shade, indicating color options are available for the product.

articles.title: This Handy Roborock Qrevo Robot Vacuum and Mop Is Half-Price at Amazon Right Now
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A new robot pal is designed to handle chores for users, offering a hands-free approach to household tasks. This implies the launch or introduction of a new product in the robotics or home automation sector.

articles.title: Silent Hill 2 developer Bloober shows off Cronos: The New Dawn's intriguing merge mechanics
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Bloober is launching Cronos: The New Dawn, a new survival horror game. A fresh trailer showcases the gameplay and the game's unique merge mechanic.

articles.title: Test-Driving The 2025 Jaecoo 7 Super Hybrid System SUV
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Jaecoo is presented as a strong competitor, prioritizing technology and luxury features with its new hybrid system.

articles.title: AI Agents: Hype Vs. Reality – Practical Impact Over Perfect Autonomy
articles.author: Quora
articles.summary: Cognition has developed 'Devin', an AI software engineer, with capabilities to debug, deploy applications, and manage GitHub issues. Although marketed as an independent worker, it currently functions more like an advanced coding assistant requiring human oversight, and it functions most effectively alongside humans.

articles.title: Buried in Laundry?: Poplin comes to the rescue
articles.author: Karen Schaffner
articles.summary: Poplin, co-founded by Mort Fertel, introduces a new app-based laundry service that allows customers to outsource their laundry by placing it outside their door for pickup and delivery. Poplin charges $1 per pound with free pickup and delivery, guarantees quality, and caters to individuals seeking convenience, especially stay-at-home moms and seniors.

articles.title: Madrí Excepcional launches alcohol-free version
articles.author: Belfast Telegraph
articles.summary: Molson Coors Beverage Company has introduced Madrí Excepcional 0.0%.

articles.title: China's Yuanfudao unveils next-gen AI learning device
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Yuanfudao, a Chinese edtech firm, launched the Xiaoyuan AI learning machine. This new device is equipped with an intelligent base and aims to provide a customized learning experience by transforming traditional learning tools.

articles.title: Redmi A5 launched in India: Check price, specifications, where to buy
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi A5, a new affordable smartphone, in India. The Redmi A5 includes features like an HD+ display, a fingerprint scanner, a 32MP AI dual rear camera, and an 8MP front camera.

articles.title: 'I tried Easter eggs that M&S can't keep in stock and one blew me away'
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer introduces fun and innovative Easter products appealing to both children and adults.
